hero.title: Legal Notice
hero.description: Important legal information regarding the platform, liability, and limitations

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.status: Status: Private Limited Company by Shares

legalStatus.title: Legal Status
legalStatus.paragraph1: The "Dream Team" project is a civic initiative operating within the framework of Israeli law. The platform serves as a technological tool to promote democratic discourse and does not replace existing democratic institutions.
legalStatus.paragraph2: The company is duly registered with the Ministry of Justice and operates in accordance with all relevant laws, including the Privacy Protection Law, the Computers Law, and the Companies Law.

generalResponsibility.title: General Responsibility
generalResponsibility.paragraph: The service is provided "as is" and "as available." The company does not guarantee continuous availability of the service and is not responsible for damages resulting from interruptions or technical malfunctions.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.paragraph: The company is not responsible for content published by users or candidates. Each user is responsible for the content they publish and its legal consequences.

politicalDecisions.title: Political Decisions
politicalDecisions.paragraph: The platform provides tools for informed decision-making but does not advise or guide on political choices. Each user is responsible for their own choices.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: All content, design, code, and technology on the website are protected by copyright and belong to "Dream Team Ltd." or third parties who have granted a license.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: It is prohibited to copy, distribute, modify, or use the website's content without explicit written permission.
intellectualProperty.paragraph3: Users grant the company a non-exclusive license to use the content they upload for the purpose of operating the platform.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.paragraph1: The use of the platform shall be governed solely by Israeli law. Any dispute arising from the use of the service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Tel Aviv-Yafo.
governingLaw.paragraph2: In case of a dispute, the parties will make an effort to resolve the dispute through mediation before resorting to court.

updates.title: Updates and Notices
updates.paragraph1: The company may update this legal notice from time to time. Updates will be published on the website and will take effect immediately upon publication.
updates.paragraph2: Continued use of the platform after the publication of updates constitutes acceptance of the changes.
updates.paragraph3: Material changes will be brought to the attention of users through a notice on the website or via email.
